data.title: Robert Altman & Altman-esque - free movies by the director and protégé Alan Rudolph
data.meta_description: The centenary of filmmaker Robert Bernard Altman's (M*A*S*H) birth will be in November 2025. A Perfect Couple (1979) Buffalo Bill and the Indians, or Sitting Bull's History Lesson (1976) McCabe and Mrs Miller (1971) Thieves Like Us (1974) HEALTH (1980) Secret Honor (1984) Come Back to the Five and D
